name: Smolest Seascape 2
description: Smol version of my own photograph taken back in 2015. As an islander i have a very different relation with nature. There isnt a day i am not inside an olive grove, visiting a beach or taking a stroll to the footpaths of my island. A vast network of footpaths used to be the "roads" of Paxos before cars. These footaths today are used for trekking or during olive harvest. On this photograph i am on the west side of the island on one of these footpaths. When i noticed a smol boat coming from the north, i waited for the moment he was passing under the setting sun to get its figure and the golden seascape. 16x16px George Angelis 2021.
